2.text:
[dt_sc_hr_invisible size="small" /]

Solar energy is harnessing the power of sunlight into electricity directly or by using photovoltaic PV. At Veda Solar Energy Units, we use photons of light to excite or stimulate the silicon cell electrons to create electricity from the sun’s rays with solar powered photovoltaic panels.
